Detailed Description

FactoryManager for scheuler and optimizer

Member Function Documentation

static void Sched::FactoryManager::bind ( const std::string &  name,
OptimizerFactory *  optF 
) throw (Util::InvalidArgumentError) [static]

Bind an optimizer with a name. If the name already exists, then the previous factory definition is lost.

Parameters:
name the name of the kind of object created by the factory
optF the factory
Exceptions:
Util::InvalidArgumentError if factory is 0
